Automated STR Requests Based onÂ Claims Establishment
Establishing a claim in the Veterans Benefits Management System (VBMS)/Share will automatically request service treatment records (STRs) from the Healthcare Artifacts and Image Management Solution (HAIMS) if the conditions described in
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 2.B.1.c
are met.
The status of the HAIMS STR request can be found in the
Virtual Lifetime Electronic Record (VLER) Portal
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Procedures for Obtaining Service Treatment Records (STRs)
